dct_title_s: [Preliminary mineralogical and geological map of the state of California
dct_description_sm: issued by the California State Mining Bureau] ; drawn by J.C. Henkenius.
Relief shown by shading and spot heights.
Map is only 1/4 portion of a larger map.
Includes inset "Table of altitudes" and table of "Explanations Rock Formations."
"A.R. Crook" stamped in ink on back of map.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
